post.body: Anyone find any interesting/ funny sites?

I'm going to start listing all the interesting sites I find as comments to this post. I'm going to omit the http://127.0.0.1:43110/ for web addresses to keep things short. I'm not going to list scam sites or sites that host illegal content. My goal is to find the gems that are buried under all the shit/ spam.

comment.body: I was wondering the same thing.
First site is Thisguy1337's Place, which has a page that lists companies that abuse the copyright system, it's a good read: 14bTLZjNvimrzHouiBzuu8Kz6fX8DHuGw1

A website with some utility to it. It's a site that lists untrusted zeronet sites and has a page to auto-blacklist porn sites. While I disagree with the "make zeronet family friendly" stuff on the website, it's useful if you don't want to accidentally stumble upon fucked up content. 1Q6a561JeaKFMi5TsmYW5NrBhAMwAei6ik

PaintNinja's Blog has some useful scripts to fix broken windows features. It's from 2016 so the scripts might be too outdated to work, but the source code for them is there if you want to use/ update them yourself. 1BufKyfSLxGcWFkP6T3t4HJYXzhKA1DVrM

Thanks to bustooni@zeroid.bit for bringing this one up! It's called Rex Research an it archives, "... Articles about suppressed, dormant, or emerging Sciences, Technologies, Inventions, Theories, Therapies, & other Alternatives..." It's got some interesting papers, though some of the pages appear to be broken. The site does say it's under reconstruction so maybe in the future all the pages will work. 1D6QfsBSZHmYWbuCxKG5ya31BiTczoZiES
